00028 #ifndef __CgProgram_H__
00029 #define __CgProgram_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgreCgPrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreHighLevelGpuProgram.h"
00033 #include "OgreStringVector.h"

00035 namespace Ogre {
00045     class CgProgram : public HighLevelGpuProgram
00046     {
00047     public:
00049         class CmdEntryPoint : public ParamCommand
00050         {
00051         public:
00052             String doGet(const void* target) const;
00053             void doSet(void* target, const String& val);
00054         };
00056         class CmdProfiles : public ParamCommand
00057         {
00058         public:
00059             String doGet(const void* target) const;
00060             void doSet(void* target, const String& val);
00061         };
00063         class CmdArgs : public ParamCommand
00064         {
00065         public:
00066             String doGet(const void* target) const;
00067             void doSet(void* target, const String& val);
00068         };
00069 
00070     protected:
00071 
00072         static CmdEntryPoint msCmdEntryPoint;
00073         static CmdProfiles msCmdProfiles;
00074         static CmdArgs msCmdArgs;
00075 
00077         CGcontext mCgContext;
00079         CGprogram mCgProgram;
00082         void loadFromSource(void);
00085         void createLowLevelImpl(void);
00087         void unloadHighLevelImpl(void);

00090

00097         String mEntryPoint;
00098         String mSelectedProfile;
00099         String mProgramString;
00100         CGprofile mSelectedCgProfile;
00101         String mCompileArgs;
00102         // Unfortunately Cg uses char** for arguments - bleh
00103         // This is a null-terminated list of char* (each null terminated)
00104         char** mCgArguments;
00105         
00106         GpuConstantDefinitionMap mParametersMap;
00107         size_t mParametersMapSizeAsBuffer;

00112         void buildArgs(void);

00121             const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader,

00123         ~CgProgram();
00124 
00126         void setEntryPoint(const String& entryPoint) { mEntryPoint = entryPoint; }
00128         const String& getEntryPoint(void) const { return mEntryPoint; }
00130         void setProfiles(const StringVector& profiles);
00132         const StringVector& getProfiles(void) const { return mProfiles; }
00134         void setCompileArguments(const String& args) { mCompileArgs = args; }
00136         const String& getCompileArguments(void) const { return mCompileArgs; }
00138         bool isSupported(void) const;
00140         bool getPassTransformStates(void) const { return true; /* CG uses MVP matrix when -posinv argument passed */ }
00142         const String& getLanguage(void) const;
